wallets.name: D'cent
wallets.description: Doesn't open. Doesn't support ethereum: intents

wallets.name: Daimo
wallets.description: Doesn't open. Doesn't support ethereum: intents

wallets.name: Exodus
wallets.description: Opens, but value does not take decimals into account, and opens Ethereum instead of the L2 network. Bug report sent through support.

wallets.name: MetaMask
wallets.description: Sometimes works, but send button is often disabled. Bug report sent through GitHub.

wallets.name: Phantom
wallets.description: Doesn't open. Doesn't support ethereum: intents

wallets.name: Rainbow
wallets.description: Works but gets stuck loading gas/USD values. Bug report sent through GitHub.

wallets.name: Ready (prev Argent)
wallets.description: App opens but requires user to select tokens manually instead of auto-filling

wallets.name: Trust Wallet
wallets.description: App opens and destination address is filled but token amount is not filled, and can only send ETH on Ethereum

wallets.name: Zerion
wallets.description: App opens but requires user to select destination address and tokens manually instead of auto-filling
